com.e.zhongjieruan.donationmakedifference

Class DonationFacade

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.e.zhongjieruan.donationmakedifference.DonationFacade

  • public class DonationFacade
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implement the Facade design pattern. When user click the donate button on the app DonationFacade object will be created which will call three separate methods from class Payment, Donation, and User.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DonationFacade(java.lang.String cardName, int cardNumber, java.lang.String cardType, int amountDonate, int donationAmount, User user)
      This constructor Initialize the amount of money user donated and the total amount of money the donation required,and initialize payment, donation, user objects

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String donate()
      This method is called when user hit the donation button it checks whether the credit card information is valid and whether the amount of money user donated exceed the amount of money a donation required
      int updateNewAmount()
      This method will update the newer amount of money a donation needed after receive a donation.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • DonationFacade

        public DonationFacade(java.lang.String cardName,
                      int cardNumber,
                      java.lang.String cardType,
                      int amountDonate,
                      int donationAmount,
                      User user)
        This constructor Initialize the amount of money user donated and the total amount of money the donation required,and initialize payment, donation, user objects
        Parameters:
        cardName - Name appear on credit card
        cardNumber - credit card number
        cardType - credit card type
        amountDonate - amount of money user donated
        donationAmount - amount of money a donation required
        user - information of the user who donate

    • Method Detail

      • donate

        public java.lang.String donate()
        This method is called when user hit the donation button it checks whether the credit card information is valid and whether the amount of money user donated exceed the amount of money a donation required
        Returns:
        This returns a string indicates whether donation is success

      • updateNewAmount

        public int updateNewAmount()
        This method will update the newer amount of money a donation needed after receive a donation.
        Returns:
        Returns how much money need to be received in the future
